comment.body: Already did the test on clearnet but nice work to have it setup on ZeroNet ! :)
@Jayofthezero: I still have the screenshot but not the page URL, pretty similar to you guys : 79.5% socialist, 64% peace, 66% liberal, 78% very progressive :)
@Jayofthezero: Indeed ! What else in a new-ish network based on p2p, equality and free of governance ? <3
